summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 MAGIC TILT TAL52044 BOAT TRAILER.  THE PIECE THAT HOLDS THE CALIPER TO THE AXLE IN THE BRAKING SYSTEM IS RUSTING ABNORMALLY.  THE FAILURE OF THIS COMPONENT INCREASES THE RISK OF A CRASH.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THE COMPONENT WAS UNABLE TO BE REPAIRED AND DID NOT ASSIST.  THE CONTACT CALLED THE MANUFACTURER, BUT DID NOT RECEIVE A RESPONSE.  HE HAS PICTURES OF THE FAILED COMPONENT.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE NOT APPLICABLE.     UPDATED 04-17-09
